1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Weatherly,
You are very welcome! Please see the attached net cash estimate reflecting your rate of $110/hr assuming you are working 80 hours a month (same as the previous estimates we came up with). Please let me know if you have any questions about this.
Thank you and have a great day! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Weatherly [mailto:weatherly@iname.com] Sent: Monday, September 12, 2011 6:03 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Follow up on voicemail
Thanks Nicolette. You are great!
Sent from my iPhone
On Sep 12, 2011, at 17:48, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Weatherly,
Im sorry I didnt have a chance to call you back today, I was on the phone for most of the afternoon. I will create the net cash estimate to your specifications in the morning and email it over to you and if you have any questions about it you may call me and we can discuss. Have a great evening, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
